resources.string: In the Name of Allah. This app is used to ring your friends phones by calling them to wake up them to prayer. The app repeats call automatically until your friend rejects / answers the call, or the max ring count is reached. You can specify the max number of repeated calls for each list item. You can reorder the calling list and you can add the number more than once. You can view the log for calls from the above menu.
Are you sure you want to delete the log?
Auto calls have been already started. Do you want to stop it now?
Please add at least one item to the list first
Some numbers in list have not responded. Try again with them now?
Are you sure you want to delete this group?
At least two members should be selected
With groups, you can add numbers to group such that when one of them responds / rejects, the other members are not called.
Contacts List is empty. Please add contacts to the calling list in the main screen
